title: Ep. 689 Why Is the Media Ignoring this Bombshell Story?
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the explosive House of Representatives IT scandal revelations. I also discuss the Democrats’ increasingly ridiculous immigration positioning. Finally, I address the growing Medicaid crisis and how Obamacare contributed to it. 
 
News Picks:
Why is the media ignoring this explosive scandal?
 
The Dems are modifying their gun confiscation strategy. 
 
Why did this online dictionary change its definition of an “assault rifle”?
 
California’s immigration policy is absolutely ridiculous. 
 
President Trump has an opportunity to remake the liberal 9th Circuit.
 
People are dying on Medicaid waiting lists because of liberal “compassion.” 
 
“Gun control” isn’t reducing violence in London. 
 
Myth-busting: Did Australian gun confiscation eliminate mass shootings?  
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
